title: What it's like to turn into Superman in Fortnite

author: IGN
description:
The Man of Steel himself has just become part of Fortnite. With the James Gunn reboot of Superman now in theaters, players can jump into Fornite to take on the role of the Krptonian hero and obliterate everyone on the map, well for a small amount of time at least. Here's Superman gameplay in Fornite.

00:00 - Intro
01:21 - Superman!

#IGN #Fortnite #Superman
title: Superman Gameplay in Fornite (4K, 60fps)

author: IGN
description:
Today on the Daily Fix: The drama surrounding Subnautica 2 intensifies as the game’s original creators file a lawsuit against Krafton over a massive $250 million bonus dispute. Meanwhile, Nintendo just shut down a major piracy site with help from the FBI as the company ramps up its anti-piracy efforts. And could Final Fantasy be returning to its classic turn-based roots? Producer Naoki Yoshida responds after the success of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Ousted Subnautica 2 Leadership Files Lawsuit Against Krafton - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Soaking in a hot spring isn’t just for relaxing in Death Stranding 2, it’s a full-on fast travel system! In this video,  Arielle Danan (IGN Freelance Guides Editor) breaks down how to unlock and use all nine Hot Springs scattered across the world, including the perks, buffs, and benefits each one provides.

We’ll walk you through the exact requirements for unlocking the Hot Spring Digger, where to scan for dig sites, and what rewards you’ll get for completing the Hydrologist’s mission. From stamina boosts to stealth perks, recharging batteries to repairing cargo, each spring is worth your time!

00:00 - Intro  
00:34 - How to Unlock Hot Springs  
01:14 - How to Use the Hot Spring Digger  
01:30 - Heartman's Hot Spring Location  
01:57 - Miracle Spring Location  
02:24 - Digestive Spring Location  
02:40 - Healing Spring Location  
02:57 - Chiral Spring Location  
03:11 - Tar Spring Location  
03:45 - Clairvoyant Spring Location  
04:01 - Metallic Spring Location  
04:12 - Recharging S
title: Death Stranding 2: All 9 Hot Spring Locations | Buffs and Rewards

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Enhanced Trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War Definitive Edition, an upcoming remaster of the classic real-time strategy game developed by Relic Entertainment. Players will be able to experience the legendary title with enhancements for the modern era. The game is packed with the base game including all of the expansions coupled with enhanced visuals, 4K support, pathfinding improvements, and more. Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War Definitive Edition is launching on August 14 for PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War Definitive Edition - Official Enhanced Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for Bullet Time, a vibrant animated series produced by Hyperspace Films.

In a surreal world fueled by retro gaming nostalgia and Saturday morning cartoon mayhem, Bullet Time follows Bullet - an emotionally unstable bull terrier - as he battles his way through a bizarre digital gaming universe. Fueled by frenetic action, heart, and absurd humor, "Bullet Time" delivers a visually explosive ride that blends 90s cartoon weirdness with cutting-edge animation and a pulse-pounding original score.

Bullet Time stars Eric Bauza, David Firth, Luis Bordonada, and Ulyana. The series is directed and created by Eddie Alcazar.

Bullet Time is coming soon.
title: Bullet Time - Official Trailer | Eric Bauza, David Firth, Luis Bordonada

author: IGN
description:
Join the developers at Gearbox for a deep dive into the Dark Siren, Vex, in this latest behind-the-scenes video for Borderlands 4, an upcoming mayhem-fueled looter shooter game. Check out the video to learn about Vex's skill trees and action skills.

In Borderlands 4, explore a dangerous hidden planet Kairos as one of four new badass Vault Hunters. Break free from the oppressive Timekeeper, a ruthless dictator who dominates the masses from on high. Now, a world-altering catastrophe threatens his perfect Order, unleashing mayhem across the planet. Ignite a resistance and blast your way through mechanical monstrosities, bloodthirsty bandits, and vicious beasts, with new traversal mechanics like: double jumping, gliding, dodging, fixed-point grappling, and more.

Borderlands 4 will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam) on September 12, 2025.

#Borderlands4 #Gaming #IGN
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Vex Abilities Breakdown: Beyond The Borderlands #3

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the latest 'Fantastivision' Trailer for The Fantastic Four: First Steps, the latest installment in the MCU distributed by Marvel Studios. Viewers can take in the sights and sounds of the retro-inspired film setting off the biggest cinematic event of the year. The Fantastic Four: First Steps is in theaters on July 25.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, the
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official 'Fantastivision' Trailer (2025) Pedro Pascal

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Freakier Friday in this latest teaser for the upcoming comedy movie sequel to the Disney classic, Freaky Friday. Freakier Friday stars Jamie Lee Curtis and Lindsay Lohan. 

In Freakier Friday, Curtis and Lohan reprise their roles as Tess and Anna Coleman. The story picks up years after Tess (Curtis) and Anna (Lohan) endured an identity crisis. Anna now has a daughter of her own and a soon-to-be stepdaughter. As they navigate the myriad challenges that come when two families merge, Tess and Anna discover that lightning might indeed strike twice. 

Freakier Friday is directed by Nisha Ganatra and based on the book Freaky Friday by Mary Rodgers. The film, which also stars Julia Butters, Sophia Hammons, Manny Jacinto, Maitreyi Ramakrishnan, Rosalind Chao, Chad Michael Murray, Vanessa Bayer, and Mark Harmon, is produced by Kristin Burr, p.g.a., Andrew Gunn, p.g.a., and Jamie Lee Curtis, with Nathan Kelly, Ann Marie Sanderlin, and Lindsay Lohan serving as executive produ
title: Freakier Friday - Official 'Tickets Available Now' Teaser Trailer (2025) Lindsay Lohan

author: IGN
description:
James Gunn’s Superman is finally in theaters and it brings with it a bombshell of a surprise when it comes to The Man of Steel and his Kryptonian origins. Starring David Corenswet, Nicholas Hoult and Rachel Brosnahan, the film sets the foundation for the upcoming DCU with plenty of twists, turns and surprises for fans. 

Lex Luthor and Superman go head to head as Clark Kent and Lois Lane work to figure out their relationship during the most tumultuous time of Kal-El’s story yet (at least so far as this version of Superman is concerned). The first DCU adventure hints at plenty of future surprises from Co-DC Studios Chairs James Gunn and Peter Safran and, if we’re very lucky, Krypto will be involved in as many of them as possible. 

In the meantime Warner Bros. Pictures and the DCU have created a brand new world, springboarding from DC Comics and delivering the most exciting DC story in some time by way of the newest Superman movie.
title: James Gunn Took A Huge Risk By Changing Superman's Origin Story

description:

title: Here are the games you should play first on the Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition #sponsored

author: IGN
description:
Take your game to the next level and stream Xbox Game Pass titles via Xbox Cloud Gaming on a huge 26-foot virtual screen, with the Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition. This limited edition hardware can play Xbox Game Pass games right out of the box, no Xbox console needed. So what should you play first? Here’s our list of the games you should play on your new Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition. Sponsored by EE.

Purchase yours from EE and get 24 months Xbox Game Pass Ultimate bundled in:  https://ee.co.uk/products/meta-quest-3s-xbox-edition

#MetaQuest3SXboxEdition #Xbox #Gaming
title: The First Games You Should Play On The Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week Ryan and Max try and make sense of the latest round of layoffs fro Microsoft, which saw the company dismiss over 9,000 staff across multiple subsidiaries. Arkane Studios founder Raphael Collantonio recently blamed Game Pass for the megapublisher's financial belt tightening, but recent sales data suggests Game Pass isn't hurting game sales; in fact, five of the top seven best-selling games of May 2025 were Microsoft-published titles, and all available on Game Pass. This suggests that those games are selling very well on other platforms, like PlayStation. So what's really to blame?

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Game Pass Isn't Hurting Xbox Sales, So Is AI To Blame For Layoffs? - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Spoiler alert! With James Gunn's Superman, the DCU gets off to a flying start, introducing surprises and twists on canon that are sure to get fans debating over the future of the new cinematic universe. IGN's Tom Jorgensen and Jim Vejvoda break down all the biggest moments in the movie, and what they could mean for future DCU movies.

#IGN #Superman #DC
title: Superman Spoilercast: How James Gunn Sets Up The Future of The DCU

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Beyond 905, For anyone wanting a big huge open-world samurai game, 2025 is probably a fun year. Assassin’s Creed Shadows turned players loose in a massive recreation of feudal japan to slice and dice a trail of revenge, and now, Ghost of Yotei is… doing that too! And that’s great. We discuss how Sucker Punch’s follow up to Tsushima is setting itself apart, what looks too samey, and what we’re excited about in general about one of PlayStation’s biggest games of the generation.

***
For thousands of years (or at least since the 90s) PlayStation has been pushing the boundaries of the video game medium. For almost as long, Beyond has been along for the ride. Join a panel of passionate playstation experts and enthusiasts including Max Scoville, Brian Altano, Jada Griffin and company. Each week we unpack the latest gaming news, gush about what we’re playing, chat with developers and voice actors and explore the ever-expanding world of PlayStation - and Beyond! Catch a n
title: How Ghost of Yotei Stands Out In Assassin's Creed's Shadow - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Red Sonja trailer for this upcoming film starring Matilda Lutz as Red Sonja in this reboot. Red Sonja also stars Robert Sheehan, Wallis Day, Martyn Ford, Michael Bisping, Phillip Winchester, and Trevor Eve.

Captured. Chained. Forced to fight for survival. Red Sonja must battle her way through the blood-soaked pits of a tyrant’s empire and rally an army of outcasts to reclaim her freedom and take down Dragan and his ruthless bride, Dark Annisia.

The film is produced by Les Weldon, Yariv Lerner, Luke Lieberman, Christa Campbell, Lati Grobman, Joe Gatta, MJ Basset, Jeffrey Greenstein, Avi Lerner, Mark Canton, P.G.A., Courtney Soloman, P.G.A, Jonathan Yunger. Executive producers on Red Sonja are Trevor Short, Darina Pavlova, Boaz Davidson, Tanner Mobley, Luke Lieberman, Dorothy Canton, Scott Karol, and Heidi Jo Markel. Red Sonja is written by Tasha Huo.

Red Sonja, directed by MJ Bassett, opens in theaters on August 15, 2025, and it releases digitally on August 29, 2025.
title: Red Sonja - Official Trailer (2025) Matilda Lutz

author: IGN
description:
Once the greatest hitman of all, Taro Sakamoto retired in the name of love. But when his past catches up, he must fight to protect his beloved family. Watch the Sakamoto Days trailer for Season 1 Part 2 of the anime series. Season 1 Part 2 of Sakamoto Days will premiere on Netflix on July 14, 2025, with one episode released each week. Season 1 Part 1 is streaming exclusively on Netflix.

Jacob Bertrand (Netflix’s Cobra Kai), joins the world of Sakamoto Days as the English voice of Gaku, a member of Slur’s gang. The returning English voice cast includes: Matthew Mercer (Blood of Zeus) as Taro Sakamoto, Dallas Liu (Netflix’s Avatar: The Last Airbender) as Shin Asakura, Rosalie Chiang (Turning Red) as Lu Shaotang, Rosie Okumura as Aoi Sakamoto, Xolo Maridueña (Cobra Kai) as Heisuke Mashimo, Aleks Le (Solo Leveling) as Nagumo, and Vinnie Hacker as X/Slur.
title: Sakamoto Days - Official Part 2 Trailer (English Dub)

author: IGN
description: Check out the Superman (DCU) Trailer for DC Worlds Collide, a mobile free-to-play action RPG developed by WB Games San Francisco. Players can get a new variant of the Man of Steel with Superman (DCU) joining the game's roster. Based on the look and design of the latest DC Studios Superman film, players can take on battles and fight in style with Guy Gardner, Mister Terrific, and Krypto arriving later in Summer 2025. Superman (DCU) is available now for DC Worlds Collide for iOS and Android.
title: DC Worlds Collide - Official Superman (DCU) Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Official Trailer for Pets on a Train, an animated family adventure film distributed by Viva Pictures. 

When a crew of animal bandits embark on a fairly routine swindle, they find themselves caught up in a high-tech, professional train heist. It’s up to Falcon, a petty thief raccoon, and Rex, a righteous police-dog, to save the animals stuck onboard this high-speed runway train.

Pets on a Train is directed by Benoît Daffis and Jean-Christian Tassy and produced by Tat Productions.

Pets on a Train is releasing into theaters across North America on October 17.
title: Pets on a Train - Official Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Resident Evil: Survival Unit announcement for this upcoming survival horror mobile strategy game co-developed by Aniplex Inc. and JOYCITY Corporation (CEO: Seong Won Cho), based in South Korea. Resident Evil: Survival Unit features iconic characters across the franchise, including Claire Redfield, Leon S. Kennedy, Jill Valentine, and more. The game also features guest designer with original creature design by Yoshitaka Amano. Resident Evil: Survival Unit will be available on mobile in 2025, and pre-registration is available now on the App Store and Google Play.

Set in a parallel universe, the game presents an original storyline that builds upon the Resident Evil world while diverging from the original series. 

The game opens with the protagonist awakening in a mysterious hospital, having been used as a test subject by Umbrella Corporation. As players uncover the truth and attempt to escape, the story unfolds into a parallel world where familiar characters fro
title: Resident Evil: Survival Unit - Official Announcement (Multi-Language Audio)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Official Trailer for Chief of War, an upcoming historical drama mini-series distribuited by Apple TV+. Viewers will be taken on a journey centering on the unification of the Hawaiian Islands from an indigenous perspective. Chief of War premieres globally on Friday, August 1 on Apple TV+.

Set amidst the beautiful backdrop of the islands of Hawai‘i, the nine-episode series, based on true events, follows warrior Ka’iana, as he tries to unify the islands before Western colonization in the late 18th century.

Chief of War stars Jason Momoa, Luciane Buchanan, Temuera Morrison, Te Ao o Hinepehinga, Cliff Curtis, newcomer Kaina Makua, Moses Goods, Siua Ikale’o, Brandon Finn, James Udom, Mainei Kinimaka,Te Kohe Tuhaka, and Benjamin Hoetjes. 

“Chief of War" is produced for Apple TV+ by FIFTH SEASON and Chernin Entertainment. Momoa directs the season finale and serves as executive producer. Doug Jung serves as showrunner and executive produces along with Sibbett, Peter Chern
title: Chief of War - Official Trailer (2025) Jason Momoa, Temuera Morrison
